summary: The NHL is the top professional ice hockey league in the world, with 32 teams across the U.S. and Canada. It was founded in 1917 in Montreal, originally with four Canadian teams. The league expanded to the U.S. in 1924 and now has teams from both countries. The Stanley Cup, the oldest pro sports trophy in North America, is awarded to the playoff champion each year. The NHL is one of the major sports leagues in the U.S. and Canada, grossing more revenue than many other global sports leagues.
title: National Hockey League
